channel.title: Ashwater - Pi Stories
channel.description: Daily short stories generated by a 15M parameter AI running on a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W

item.title: Ann's Cat: January 30, 2026
item.description: In a cozy house, a smallgirl named Ann had a bedroom. It was a very nice place to sleep and play. One day, when it was time for Ann to go outside and play in...
